thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceeded our expectations!
thread.title_full: Exceeded our expectations! - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sian S
title: Exceeded our expectations!
text:
After arriving to the hotel after a long flight from the UK we were greeted by Albert on the door who kindly took our cases and said they would be taken to our room.
Then we checked in with a lady called Alba on reception who couldn't be more helpful, even though our previous room wasn't ready, we were upgraded to the 43rd floor with amazing views of the Empire State Building and city sites.
Jessie and her team went above and beyond to make my mams birthday very special by sending a lovely cake and champagne up to the room
This was a lovely personal touch!
We also requested a late checkout for 6pm due to our flights being later that evening and they were happy to oblige.
Couldn't fault the service at all and won't hesitate to be back I'd recommend this hotel to friends and family
Thank you for a fantastic week
From Lesley and Sian
